ThingDef.label: Crystal Orchid
ThingDef.description: Crystal Orchid, scientific name Dust-Mech Regeneration Plant. A genetically modified plant that is highly symbiotic with Dust-Mech for the production of Dust-Mech substances, its seed packets are placed into almost all Celestia emergency survival kits as one of the sources of Dust-Mech substances for extreme situations, and possibly the only source of Dust-Mech for those who do not want to risk serious blood loss. \n\nIts special and interesting life cycle and extremely high mineral requirements make it require a long growing time and a very high fertility requirement for the land, almost exclusively in hydroponic tanks and fertile soil. Please be careful not to let the cold snap destroy these crops.
